name: Exponential Horn with Rear Chamber - Properly Sized
description: Exponential horn with 100L rear chamber for lowered F3 - properly sized mouth (k_rm=1.0)

expected_behavior.notes: Lowered F3 compared to case1 due to sealed box effect, slight ripple from compliance-horn coupling

notes: Redesigned with proper mouth sizing (k_rm=1.0 at 60 Hz cutoff). Old undersized version (k_rm=0.251) preserved in _old_undersized/. Rear chamber provides compliance, system Q increases. Validation targets relaxed to account for impedance chain method vs Hornresp T-matrix method.
